questions.question: You get into a taxi with an Asian driver. You:

choices.answer: Assume he won't know where he's going treat him with disgust
Think you will have difficulty explaining where you're going
Don't Notice

questions.question: You go to visit the doctor and he turns out to be of ethnic background. Do you:

choices.answer: Marvel at how things have changed in the last 25 years
Think you'll be OK but he wont be as good as an AngloAus doc
Assume he's probably not properly trained. Medical cert?

questions.question: You're asked by an Indigenous person for money for his bus fare home. Do you assume:

choices.answer: He's going to spend it on food
He's going to spend it on drink
He's going to spend it on his bus fare home

questions.question: Someone tells a racist joke. Do you:

choices.answer: Try to outdo them with an even more racist joke
walk away or object to the racism being displayed
laugh along - they're mostly harmless

questions.question: The fact that there's a concentration of Asian in a particular suburb is:

choices.answer: A real worry since they're not assimilating into Aus society
A good thing because while they're keeping to their own
A simple fact of life; they want to establish themselves
An affectionate term for our English cousins
A term of abuse
Should always be prefaced with the word "whingeing"

questions.question: A tradesperson from another ethnic group comes to your house. Do you:

choices.answer: Offer a cup of tea
Assume you're probably going to get ripped off
Hope that they're the ethnicity that's good at that trade

questions.question: There's a lot of unemployment in the Aboriginal community because:

choices.answer: Discrimination in the job market is rife
They don't want to work
They're unreliable workers

questions.question: A man and women of Middle Eastern appearance are arguing in the street. You:

choices.answer: Think men from the MiddleEast usually treat women bad
Watch as you would for any woman being berated on the street
Turn away and wish they'd keep their disputes to themselves

questions.question: A young man who looks like an Islander asks to use your mobile because of an emergency. You:

choices.answer: Hand over your phone
Offer to make the call yourself
Ignore him and walk away

questions.question: Irish people who object to Irish jokes or New Zealanders who object to sheep jokes:

choices.answer: Have a valid complaint that they're being stereotyped
Are just making a stupid political point for no reason
Need to lighten up and not take themselves so seriously

questions.question: The best thing about multiculturalism is:

choices.answer: That it's brought Pauline Hanson to national prominence
Feeling that we have access to the richness of every culture
The variety of restaurants in your suburb
